t: AWS Trademark Guidelines - Amazon.com
s: 1 week ago - 10. Trade Dress. You will not imitate the trade dress or “look and feel” of any AWS website, including without limitation, the branding, color combinations, fonts, graphic designs, product icons, or other elements associated with AWS.
